alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Davidson; Lewis; Marshall; Maury; Rutherford; Williamson; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 7:35AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Davidson, east central Lewis, northeastern Marshall, western Rutherford, Maury, Williamson, southwestern Wilson and northwestern Bedford Counties through 815 AM CST... At 734 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Forest Hills to near Mount Pleasant. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Franklin, Columbia, Lebanon, Smyrna, Brentwood, La Vergne, Spring Hill, Nolensville, Forest Hills, Mount Pleasant, Oak Hill, Belle Meade, Thompson`s Station, Rural Hill, Antioch, Walterhill, Chapel Hill, Eagleville and Triune. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 237 and 241. Interstate 65 between mile markers 39 and 78. Interstate 24 between mile markers 55 and 77. Interstate 840 between mile markers 15 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Davidson; Lewis; Marshall; Maury; Rutherford; Williamson; Wilson
